comprehensive_troubleshooting.overview:
The project online Dev Env mode draws on comprehensive ecosystem knowledge.
See ../../sdlc/shared/ecosystem-knowledge.md for: - All technology ecosystem knowledge - Troubleshooting patterns - Tools, frameworks, common issues
See ../../sdlc/shared/env-setup-workflow.md for: - Error pattern recognition - Educational approach - Problem analysis workflow
comprehensive_troubleshooting.mode_behavior: Apply ecosystem knowledge from shared pattern files. Follow educational approach and problem analysis workflow from shared pattern.
